original_text: If a person has white marks on his skin, 39 the priest must look at the marks. If the colour of the marks is not bright, it is not a disease. The person is clean.
korean_text: 남자나 여자의 피부에 색점 곧 흰 색점이 있으면

sentences.original_text: If a person has white marks on his skin
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람의 피부에 흰 자국이 있다면

sentences.original_text: the priest must look at the marks
If the colour of the marks is not bright
